attributes.title: Season 2 - Official Trailer | Watch Now on HBO Max
attributes.caption: In this action-packed adult animated series, an all-out war leaves only a handful of highly skilled soldiers fighting for the future of humanity.
attributes.description: In this action-packed adult animated series, an all-out war leaves only a handful of highly skilled soldiers fighting for the future of humanity. After sustaining devastating injuries, pilot Julian Chase (Michael B. Jordan) returns from the dead in the form of a Holon warrior, one of a select few whose mind is compatible with the mech-suit gen:LOCK program. As Dr. Weller (David Tennant) works to crack the gen:LOCK code, it’s up to Chase, Miranda (Dakota Fanning), Cammie (Maisie Williams), and their team of intrepid Polity fighters to fend off the authoritarian Union. But as the war rages on, Chase must decide if he’s willing to sacrifice everything – including friends, family, and his own humanity – to save an increasingly hostile world.
attributes.display_title: S2:E0 - Season 2 - Official Trailer | Watch Now on HBO Max

attributes.title: When the Leaves Began to Turn
attributes.caption: As the Union’s Holon army nears the Polity’s final stronghold, Chase preps his team for what could be gen:LOCK’s last stand
attributes.description: As the Union’s Holon army nears the Polity’s final stronghold, Chase preps his team for what could be gen:LOCK’s last stand
attributes.display_title: S2:E1 - When the Leaves Began to Turn

attributes.title: The First Strike
attributes.caption: In 2068, the war between the Union and the Polity begins with a shocking strike on a major stronghold. As Yaz joins the resistance movement, Chase confronts a shocking truth.
attributes.description: In 2068, the war between the Union and the Polity begins with a shocking strike on a major stronghold. As Yaz joins the resistance movement, Chase confronts a shocking truth.

attributes.title: Buried Pain Grows Poison Trees
attributes.caption: While General Marin orders a much-needed reprieve, Chase considers the complex implications of his discovery, and Miranda angles for a promotion.
attributes.description: While General Marin orders a much-needed reprieve, Chase considers the complex implications of his discovery, and Miranda angles for a promotion. Then, a figure from the Polity’s past emerges from the shadows.
attributes.display_title: S2:E3 - Buried Pain Grows Poison Trees

attributes.title: Together. Together.
attributes.caption: As the battle to reclaim the Anvil approaches, Cammie clashes with her teammates, while Val bonds with Kazu. Later, Chase uncovers a dark truth.
attributes.description: As the battle to reclaim the Anvil approaches, Cammie clashes with her teammates, while Val bonds with Kazu. Later, Chase uncovers a dark truth.

attributes.title: The Grand Guignol
attributes.caption: General Marin’s ruthless tactics come into question while the gen:LOCK team mourns one of their own.
attributes.description: General Marin’s ruthless tactics come into question while the gen:LOCK team mourns one of their own. Later, Cammie’s search for answers leads her to Babylon.

attributes.title: The Third Way
attributes.caption: As the gen:LOCK team prepares for their raid on RTASA, Miranda hatches a plan to appeal to Chase’s emotions, while General Marin confronts the Polity’s latest plot.
attributes.description: As the gen:LOCK team prepares for their raid on RTASA, Miranda hatches a plan to appeal to Chase’s emotions, while General Marin confronts the Polity’s latest plot.

attributes.title: Twilight
attributes.caption: As Miranda and Chase head to New York to face off against the Twilight, Cammie and Caliban near a breakthrough that could help Henry crack gen:LOCK’s code.
attributes.description: As Miranda and Chase head to New York to face off against the Twilight, Cammie and Caliban near a breakthrough that could help Henry crack gen:LOCK’s code.

attributes.title: Touch What's in Front of You
attributes.caption: As the Twilight ravages New York, Chase and the members of gen:LOCK face a fatal decision that could finally seal humanity’s fate.
attributes.description: As the Twilight ravages New York, Chase and the members of gen:LOCK face a fatal decision that could finally seal humanity’s fate.
